description: This file defines the NoteSeed class, which provides static methods to seed sample notes into a note repository or state, primarily for demo or testing purposes.

classes.name: NoteSeed
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to seed sample notes into repositories or state objects.

methods.name: seedRepository
methods.description: Seeds the provided NoteRepository with a set of predefined sample notes.

methods.name: seedState
methods.description: Seeds the notes into a NotesState instance by first refreshing it, then seeding the repository and refreshing again.
